00035 using namespace affymetrix_fusion_io;
00036 using namespace std;
00037 
00038 #define EXPRESSION_ATOMS_PER_CELL 2
00039 #define DEFAULT_VERT_ZONES 4
00040 #define DEFAULT_HORZ_ZONES 4
00041 #define DEFAULT_PERCENT_BG 2
00042 
00043 #define LARGE_FLOAT_NUMBER 999999999999999999.0f
00044 
00045 /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00046 
00047 CRawQ::CRawQ()
00048 {
00049         SetDefaults();
00050 }
00051 
00052 /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00053 
00054 CRawQ::~CRawQ()
00055 {
00056 }
00057 
00058 /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00059 
00060 void CRawQ::SetDefaults()
00061 {
00062         m_VertZones = DEFAULT_VERT_ZONES;
00063         m_HorzZones = DEFAULT_HORZ_ZONES;
00064         m_PercentBGCells = DEFAULT_PERCENT_BG;
00065 }
00066 
00067 /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00068 
00069 int DetermineZone(int x, int y, int zonex, int zoney, int vZones)
00070 {
00071         float fZx = (float) x / (float) zonex;
00072         float fZy = (float) y / (float) zoney;
00073         int Zx = (int)floor(fZx);
00074         int Zy = (int)floor(fZy);
00075         int zoneID = Zx + Zy * vZones;
00076         return zoneID;
00077 }
00078 
00079 /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00080 
00081 float CRawQ::ComputeRawQ(FusionCELData &cell, FusionCDFData &cdf)
00082 {
00083         typedef struct {
00084                 float intensity;
00085                 float stdev;
00086                 int   pixel;
00087         } CellStatisticsType;
00088 
00089 
00090         // Store the number of background cells.
00091         FusionCDFFileHeader &cdfHeader = cdf.GetHeader();
00092         float numer = cdfHeader.GetCols() * cdfHeader.GetRows() * m_PercentBGCells;
00093         float denom = m_VertZones * m_HorzZones * 100.0f;
00094         int bgCells = (int) (numer / denom);
00095 
00096 
00097         // Determine the number of remaining cells in the vertical direction.
00098         int CellsRemaining = cdfHeader.GetCols() % m_VertZones;
00099         int zonex;
00100         int zoney;
00101         if(CellsRemaining != 0)
00102                 zonex = (cdfHeader.GetCols() + 
00103                                 m_VertZones - CellsRemaining) /
00104                                 m_VertZones;
00105         else
00106                 zonex = cdfHeader.GetCols() / m_VertZones;
00107 
00108         // Determine the number of remaining cells in the horizontal direction.
00109         CellsRemaining = cdfHeader.GetRows() % m_HorzZones;
00110         if(CellsRemaining != 0)
00111                 zoney = (cdfHeader.GetRows() +
00112                                 m_HorzZones-CellsRemaining) /
00113                                 m_HorzZones;
00114         else
00115                 zoney = cdfHeader.GetRows() / m_HorzZones;
00116 
00117         // Ensure that there are a match and mismatch cell in the same zone.
00118         zoney += zoney % EXPRESSION_ATOMS_PER_CELL;
00119 
00120 
00121         // Determine the total number of zones.
00122         int NumberZones = m_VertZones * m_HorzZones;
00123 
00124         // Allocate memory for storing background data.
00125         float *zonebg = new float[NumberZones];
00126         float *zonenoise = new float[NumberZones];
00127         CellStatisticsType *bgN = new CellStatisticsType[NumberZones*bgCells];
00128 
00129         // Get number of units.
00130         int NumUnits = cdfHeader.GetNumProbeSets();
00131 
00132         // Determine the total number of atoms in the chip.
00133         FusionCDFProbeSetInformation unit;
00134         int totalCells=0;
00135         for (int iUnit=0; iUnit<NumUnits; ++iUnit)
00136         {
00137                 if (cdf.GetProbeSetType(iUnit) == affxcdf::ExpressionProbeSetType)
00138                 {
00139                         cdf.GetProbeSetInformation(iUnit, unit);
00140                         totalCells += unit.GetNumCells();
00141                 }
00142         }
00143 
00144         // Allocate space for all atoms intensities and ID's.
00145         int *entryIndex = new int[totalCells];
00146         int *intenszid = new int[totalCells];
00147 
00148         // Clear arrays.
00149         memset(intenszid, 0, sizeof(int)*totalCells);
00150         memset(entryIndex, 0, sizeof(int)*totalCells);
00151 
00152         // Loop over all units to determine the zone ID's and intensities.
00153         int iInten=0;
00154         for (int iUnit=0; iUnit<NumUnits; ++iUnit)
00155         {
00156                 // Only process expression units.
00157                 if (cdf.GetProbeSetType(iUnit) != affxcdf::ExpressionProbeSetType)
00158                         continue;
00159 
00160                 // Get the PM and MM intensity objects and their zone ids.
00161                 cdf.GetProbeSetInformation(iUnit, unit);
00162                 FusionCDFProbeGroupInformation group;
00163                 int nGroups = unit.GetNumGroups();
00164                 for (int iGroup=0; iGroup<nGroups; iGroup++)
00165                 {
00166                         unit.GetGroupInformation(iGroup, group);
00167                         int nCells = group.GetNumCells();
00168                         FusionCDFProbeInformation probe;
00169                         for (int iCell=0; iCell<nCells; iCell++)
00170                         {
00171                                 group.GetCell(iCell, probe);
00172                                 entryIndex[iInten] = cell.XYToIndex(probe.GetX(), probe.GetY());
00173                                 intenszid[iInten] = DetermineZone(probe.GetX(), probe.GetY(), zonex, zoney, m_VertZones);
00174                                 ++iInten;
00175                         }
00176                 }
00177         }
00178 
00179         // compute background for each zone
00180         for (int iZone=0; iZone<NumberZones; iZone++)
00181         {
00182                 // Initialize the background.
00183                 for(int bgcnt = 0; bgcnt < bgCells; bgcnt++)
00184                         bgN[bgcnt+(iZone*bgCells)].intensity = LARGE_FLOAT_NUMBER;
00185 
00186                 // find the lowest N intensities in each zone
00187                 for (int iInten = 0; iInten < totalCells; iInten++)
00188                 {
00189                         // Only process those intensities in the current zone.
00190                         if(intenszid[iInten] == iZone)
00191                         {
00192                                 int index_cnt;
00193                                 int index_max;
00194                                 for (index_cnt=1, index_max=0;
00195                                          index_cnt < bgCells; index_cnt++)
00196                                 {
00197                                         if(bgN[index_cnt+(iZone*bgCells)].intensity > bgN[index_max+(iZone*bgCells)].intensity)
00198                                                 index_max = index_cnt;
00199                                 }
00200 
00201 
00202                                 // Store the low intensity.
00203                                 float intensity = min(bgN[index_max+(iZone*bgCells)].intensity, cell.GetIntensity(entryIndex[iInten]));
00204                                 if (intensity != bgN[index_max+(iZone*bgCells)].intensity)
00205                                 {
00206                                         bgN[index_max+(iZone*bgCells)].intensity = cell.GetIntensity(entryIndex[iInten]);
00207                                         bgN[index_max+(iZone*bgCells)].pixel = cell.GetPixels(entryIndex[iInten]);
00208                                         bgN[index_max+(iZone*bgCells)].stdev = cell.GetStdv(entryIndex[iInten]);
00209                                 }
00210                         }
00211                 }
00212 
00213                 // compute the average
00214                 float bgSum = 0.0f;
00215                 for(int bgcnt = 0; bgcnt < bgCells; bgcnt++)
00216                         bgSum += bgN[bgcnt+(iZone*bgCells)].intensity;
00217                 zonebg[iZone] = bgSum / bgCells;
00218 
00219                 // Compute the noise.
00220                 bgSum = 0.0f;
00221                 for(int bgcnt = 0; bgcnt < bgCells; bgcnt++)
00222                         bgSum += bgN[bgcnt+(iZone*bgCells)].stdev / (float)(sqrt((float)bgN[bgcnt+(iZone*bgCells)].pixel));
00223                 zonenoise[iZone] = bgSum / bgCells;
00224         }
00225 
00226         // Compute the average noise.
00227         float avgNoise=0.0f;
00228         int totalZonesUsed = 0;
00229         for (int iZone=0; iZone<NumberZones; iZone++)
00230         {
00231                 if (zonenoise[iZone] >= 0)
00232                 {
00233                         avgNoise+=zonenoise[iZone];
00234                         ++totalZonesUsed;
00235                 }
00236         }
00237         float rawQ = avgNoise/totalZonesUsed;
00238 
00239         //Clean up
00240         delete [] entryIndex;
00241         delete [] intenszid;
00242         delete [] bgN;
00243         delete [] zonebg;
00244         delete [] zonenoise;
00245 
00246         // Return the RawQ value
00247         return rawQ;
00248 }
